banner.message: We use local storage for shopping cart and settings. Essential storage is required for basic functions, functional storage improves your experience.

preferences.title: Cookie Settings
preferences.description: Choose which categories of cookies you want to allow:

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for basic functions like shopping cart, session management, and language settings. These cannot be disabled.
essential.items: Shopping cart status, session security, language detection

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: Improve your user experience by storing order history and user preferences (7-30 days).
functional.items: Order history, cart persistence, delivery preferences

home.title: üçï Fastest pizza delivery to your door!
home.subtitle: Fresh pizzas in 15-30 minutes ‚Ä¢ Automatic postal code pricing for all Dortmund

step1.title: Enter Postal Code
step1.description: Enter name and postal code - Automatic price calculation for your zone

step2.title: Choose Pizza
step2.description: Browse our fresh menu and select your favorites

step3.title: Order & Pay
step3.description: Complete order via WhatsApp. Pay cash or card.

step4.title: Enjoy!
step4.description: Hot, fresh pizza delivered to your door in 15-30 min

question1.q: How do I order pizza via WhatsApp from Campus Pizza Dortmund?
question1.a: Once you've added your favorite pizzas to the cart, you'll receive a special WhatsApp link at checkout. Click it to send your pre-formatted order directly to our restaurant. We will then promptly confirm your delivery or collection time and payment method.

question2.q: How does Campus Pizza Dortmund's postal code-based delivery system work?
question2.a: Our intelligent system automatically calculates delivery costs based on your postal code. We deliver to 3 main zones covering 18+ postal code areas: Zone 1 (free delivery from ‚Ç¨12), Zone 2 (‚Ç¨1.50 delivery, free from ‚Ç¨40), and Zone 3 (‚Ç¨2 delivery, free from ‚Ç¨50). Pickup is also available.

question3.q: How fast is pizza delivery from Campus Pizza in Dortmund?
question3.a: Our pizza delivery in Dortmund usually takes 15-30 minutes. The exact delivery time depends on your location and order size, and will be confirmed directly when you place your order.

question4.q: What payment methods are available for pizza delivery and collection?
question4.a: You can conveniently pay by cash or card, whether for delivery or collection. Simply select your preferred payment method during the ordering process.

customer1.text: Amazing pizza and super fast delivery! The WhatsApp ordering is so convenient.
customer1.name: Sarah M.

customer2.text: Best pizza in Dortmund! Fresh ingredients and always hot when delivered.
customer2.name: Mike L.

customer3.text: Family loves the variety. Free delivery is awesome!
customer3.name: Anna M.

restaurant.aboutDescription: Welcome to Restaurant CAMPUS ‚Äì The Pizza Professionals! For years, we have been delighting our guests with authentic Italian pizzas, prepared with fresh ingredients and traditional recipes. Our team of experienced pizza professionals ensures that every pizza is perfectly baked. Visit us at Knappenstra√üe 46 in Dortmund or order conveniently to your home!

footer.description: Restaurant CAMPUS ‚Äì The Pizza Professionals. Authentic Italian pizza delivered fresh to your door. Made with the finest ingredients and traditional recipes.
footer.serviceArea: Delivery service in Dortmund and surrounding areas
